message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is an excellent match for your needs. Considering its value and quality, we propose a price of $900,000 for this exclusive opportunity.

Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I see the value in your product, $900,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'd be happy to pay $850,000.  This would allow me to move forward with the purchase and be a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After considering your offer, we've decided to counter with a price of $875,000. This reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while maintaining the value of our product.
